short_summary: The Transport Canada department is issuing a call for proposal solicitation notice (tender notice) Solicitation Number T8080-220261 under the Canadian government Public Works and Government Services procurement system to all interested bidders.
duration_in_months: 2 years and 6 months after closing date.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice

**Title:** Assessment of the Cumulative Effects of Marine Shipping (CEMS)

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01008337
**Solicitation Number:** T8080-220261

**Publication Date:** 2022-09-27
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-01T14:00:00 (Expired)

**Background:**
Transport Canada (TC) requires the services of a contractor to conduct an assessment of the cumulative effects of marine shipping activities in the South Coast area of British Columbia. The goal is to assess the cumulative effects of marine vessel activities on valued components/connections as part of the SC CEMS regional pilot site.

**Required Services:**
- Conduct an assessment of the cumulative effects of marine shipping activities
- Evaluate the impacts of marine vessel activities on valued components/connections
- Develop a comprehensive report showcasing the results of the assessment

**Contract Details:**
- Estimated quantity of commodity: 2.5 years
- Duration of contract: 2022-11-01 to 2025-06-30
- Time frame of delivery: 2022-11-01 to 2025-06-30

**Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the following Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements:
- Tsawwassen
- Maanulth
- Sechelt
- Sliammon

**Security Requirements:**
N/A

**Contract Authority:**
- Name: Louise Curtis
- Phone: 343-571-8834
- Email: louise.curtis@tc.gc.ca

**Attachments:**
- [Please see the attached documents for more information](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/06/45dc4415225fa1fafadf477d220304fd/final_tc_cems_vision_and_roadmap_from_essa.pdf)

**Note:**
Please ensure that if the notice falls within the bounds of the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), include the following requirements in the description. The full details of the tender can be found in the attached documents.
